textContent:
When there is no reference to a string in the string pool,  JVM will create a reference in the string pool. Then the string will point that references.

If u call new String("text") , create a new references in the heap and point to it
title: String pool
textContentHtml:
When there is no reference to a string in the string pool,  JVM will create a reference in the string pool. Then the string will point that references.


If u call new String("text") , create a new references in the heap and point to it
